description:
Explore a step-by-step guide for installing, configuring, and running Pydio Cells on Ubuntu to manage and collaborate on your document files.

The post How to Install Pydio Cells on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Pydio Cells on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
Discover a step-by-step guide to installing the Nvidia GeForce Now Client App on major Linux distributions such as Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, etc.

The post How to Install Nvidia GeForce Now Client App on Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Nvidia GeForce Now Client App on Linux

description:
The Panfrost project continues to grow! Last week, initial PanVK support for V10 GPUs landed upstream in Mesa’s main branch. This means that it’s now possible to start kicking the tires on Vulkan with an open source driver on Arm Mali-G610 and Mali-G310 GPUs.

The post PanVK Support for Arm V10 GPUs appeared first on Linux Today.
title: PanVK Support for Arm V10 GPUs

description:
The creator of Linux detailed the latest Linux updates at the Linux Foundation’s Open Source Summit Europe event.

The post Linus Torvalds Advises Open-Source Developers to Pursue Meaningful Projects, Not Hype appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linus Torvalds Advises Open-Source Developers to Pursue Meaningful Projects, Not Hype

description:
The GNOME Project released today GNOME 47 as the latest series of this acclaimed and beloved desktop environment for Linux-based operating systems, bringing new features and improvements.

The post GNOME 47 “Denver” Desktop Environment Officially Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: GNOME 47 “Denver” Desktop Environment Officially Released, Here’s What’s New

description:

title: 6 Best Open-Source IAM Tools in 2024

description:
Navidrome 0.53, a self-hosted music server and streamer, brings a new Nuclear theme, language additions, playlist auto-import toggle, and more.

The post Navidrome 0.53 Rolls Out With Enhanced UI appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Navidrome 0.53 Rolls Out With Enhanced UI
